title: Bloomberg Markets: Sarni Says Market Sentiment Has Changed
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sarni Says Market Sentiment Has Changed
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: James Sarni Managing Principal & Senior Portfolio Manager  Payden & Rygel Discusing an interesting time in the bond market with market sentiment having recently changed from a “yields lower for longer” to a fear of  “rates are moving higher” sentiment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
